    • 方法详细资料

      • apply

        public void apply(java.lang.Double newDistance,
                  java.lang.Double oldDistance)
        从类复制的说明: ApplyFunction
        This method is invoked once per superstep, after the SumFunction in a GatherSumApplyIteration. It updates the Vertex values.
        指定者:
        apply 在类中 ApplyFunction<K,java.lang.Double,java.lang.Double>
        参数:
        newDistance - the value computed during the current superstep.
        oldDistance - the current Vertex value.
